body_html:
I had this problem too:
tensorflow/tensorboard#588

I got around it by following these instructions:
If you broke the pip installation, you can fix it by downloading the whl file of html5lib from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/html5lib and then running pip install

I got around it by following these instructions:

body:
I had this problem too:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorboard/issues/588

I got around it by following these instructions:
If you broke the pip installation, you can fix it by downloading the whl file of html5lib from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/html5lib and then running pip install <path-to-whl-file>
